body: I think I'm just going to kill this field and add 'deviceInt64' or 'deviceAutoGPUIdx' to the parser so we can avoid the r.device(0).device_index stuff.  Moving the API to AutoGPU rather than index based isn't a bad idea, but the existing code uses indices and I'd rather not change it everywhere.
